7.description: This review is just for the massage services, which I found outstanding. You never know what you're going to get with a Groupon in places like this, so I went in managing my expectations. I got the $65 Groupon for a 90-minute deep tissue massage with aromatherapy. I'm a runner whose IT bands are always screaming, so I'm always looking for good deals on massages. I couldn't pass this one up.I was paired with Kesha, a woman of Eastern European extraction who has been expertly trained. A lot of the time, women massage therapists rely too much on elbows, etc. because they don't have the physical strength to apply the right kind of pressure. Kesha used great balance with this -- she worked out sore areas and tight muscles I didn't even know I had. After my time was up, I was begging for more! I also love the steam shower after the massage. It was just what I needed.I was surprised that a place like this had no separate changing room. And honestly, I think their off-Groupon prices are a bit high for what you get. It's a nice place but it's not really a "high-end" spa. $65 was just about right for a 90-minute deep tissue, based on the overall amenities. If they had another deal, I'd definitely go back and I'd request Kesha because she was awesome. My shoulders, back and now-loose legs thank you very much!

49.description: This place is highly recommended, I must say. If you purchase the Groupon for a 90-minute massage you get one of the best deals out there: less than one dollar per minute.I went on a Saturday afternoon. Immediately you feel welcomed as the reception staff offers one a drink and also to hang one's coat. The masseuse was very friendly, asked me what areas I wanted to focus on and checked constantly to see if the pressure was too much or not.The masseuses will differ. I felt sore after my last massage ( good thing) but not so much my first two times there as the masseuse was a different one. Specify how much pressure you would like as that can make or break an experience.I look forward to returning there once a month. A good massage is one of the few things I like to pamper myself with.

40.description: On 5-10-14 we went to heavenly massage..l have never had a problem there but the lady that did my pedicure did a horrible job and left wax on my feet and when l complained to the front desk..they told me since l was late that my services had to be rescheduled! What does that have to do with the ax on my feet? I think l'll stick to massages on here, or simply ask for Vicka..she did a great job on my friends pedi/mani

53.description: My boyfriend and I were here last weekend for the 90-minute massage groupon deal.  We originally tried to book a weekend appointment with just one day's notice, but they were all booked up.  But when we planned a few days in advance, we had no problem getting in at the same time.   It seems they are staffed enough to handle the constant groupon deals, which is nice.The lobby area is very nice, and the woman at the front desk was friendly.  She even gave us the choice between separate rooms or a couple's room (we chose the former).  She calls the therapists in on her walkie-talkie which takes away from the soothing spa experience a little, but I didn't care.  As for the massages, mine was decent, but not the best I ever had.  My boyfriend really liked his though.  So I'd still go back, especially given the rave reviews here of other therapists.

30.description: I did a 50 minute massage with Sabrina. Omg. Sabrina if you are reading this, I love you! She was wonderful. I am sore but even that feels good to me.

46.description: Definitely go here if you are looking for a great massage! Gema knows what she is doing! I got an 80 min massage and for $90 it was really a great deal. They're very friendly and the place was very clean and neat. The massage table was comfortable, but the face cradle was not. I have an issue with face cradles generally anyway, but this was one of the cheap flat wood ones. Probably could be remedied with a new and bigger pad. She offered me a steam shower after the massage that I didn't have time for, but it sounds amazing and I probably would have loved it I'm sure.

1.description: Love manicures & pedicures by Vicka( sp) she is so lovely & does beautiful work. The chairs have great massage features. I have also had my hair styled by Ina & she is beautiful, kind & an amazing hairdresser. The front staff is always pleasant . I look forward to having some of the other services that are offered!

55.description: I went in today for a massage and I just want to say I was very satisfied with my 90 minute massage I purchased through group on. The staff at the desk were very friendly and especially the therapist Viola she was very thorough she knew all the right spots on my back to massage I will definitely go back to her.

9.description: Had an absolutely "heavenly" massage from Tiara yesterday.  It was a 90 minute massage, and she used the extra time to work through not only the knots in my back, but also my sore feet, legs, arms, etc.  She had just the right touch in terms of mostly relaxing, but also getting into the knots in my back more assertively. The steam shower at the end was an unexpected treat.  Not sure the aromatherapy was really happening, though, couldn't smell a thing.

26.description: Virginia was great!  Very professional yet soothing at the same time.  She really focused on getting you into a relaxed state. She is very talented and I would recommend her definitely!

25.description: I called to make an appointment to use the 90 minute massage groupon and the receptionist have me a range of options available for that service. After picking 6 pm, she asked for my name and number. I show up at 6 for the massage and not only am I not scheduled, but they close in one hour. They try and tell me it must have been with a different location but I confirmed with them that the number I called was indeed their own. Neither receptionist apologized and instead kept trying to put me at fault. Bad sign when they can't even accurately schedule an appointment. A monkey could perform that job.

12.description: I've been to this place several times and every single time, it's a WIN!!!!! I've had a different therapist each time and each time I've received a great massage. Keep up the good work, Heavenly Massage!!!!!

59.description: Ina was reco'd to me by a friend for partial highlights. Having been "burned" literally by a Groupon highlight my last go 'round at another salon, I was willing to give her a try. My friend and my hair are very different and I figured if she could do us both, then Hooray! She was prompt, cheerful, KNOWLEDGEABLE, and wanted to get to know me and my hair. After highlights, she dried and then trimmed - amazing job. I have happy hairs. I'm definitely going again.

21.description: Well, making mistakes scheduling appointments! I called heavenly massage two days ahead to double check the time of my appointment, and they confirmed. I went  there, paid $10 for parking, and it turned out that they made a mistake setting me up one hour late with a different masseuse! They didn't offer anything as a complement in return of their mistake! "As any respected health center would do" I had to reschedule for another appointment two weeks later.

17.description: The place is clean and offer good service. The staff was ok... Although I expected a more friendly approach. Beds are nice but the head hole is a bit uncomfortable. They honored the groupon price which made it more affordable. Not the best in town, but definitely worth trying.

10.description: Don't go here for a relaxing massage or if you want a good facial. I have never written a review before now but it was that bad. I had a manicure pedicure before my massage/facial. The massage therapist brought me back to the room before my nails were dry. When I said I needed more time he acted annoyed. The massage was awful and awkward. Opposite of relaxing. When I would move around he got annoyed and asked if it was him making me uncomfortable, which it wasn't till he said that and then yeah it was. He had no rhythm. It was bumpy and awkward and not the least bit relaxing. At the end he just sat with my head in his hands for 20 mins barely moving. Uncomfortable to say the least. After my massage I told him I had a facial as well. He didn't pick up the box they had me put my clothes in or escort me out. I had to carry the box out and then awkwardly stand there while figuring out where to go. Then I saw him after stumbling around and said where do I go. He replied "Uhhh back where you came from" - rude! He pointed me to a room where a girl greeted me. She wasn't much better. The facial felt like it was 30 mins and it was not great. She barely extracted my skin. I have had facials before and my skin normally feels replenished. I could have done what she did. There was absolutely no customer service. No one tried at all to make that a comforting experience. She abruptly ended the facial and just said - nice meeting you and walked away.DO NOT go here if you want a nice relaxing day. Plenty of other great spas in the city!

5.description: I have gone here several times and have always had an enjoyable experience. Tiera and Laveese are both outstanding. The value here is amazing too. I tried another place in Chicago to see how it compares and paid double the price for a worse massage. It really showed me how great this place is in comparison. The front desk is very friendly, the massages and experience are both comfortable and their steam shower is a perfect way to end the visit.I will be back soon!

3.description: It's been a while, but I can tell by some of the other reviews that this place hasn't changed. I am not new to massage but I'd just like to say that I did not care for the place. Perhaps the groupon had something to do with the way I was treated. But, from what I observed, it was more about the fact that this place is very unprofessional from the very unimpressive massage to the male client, walking in harrassing the desk clerk like sexual harassment at work. Go somewhere else. This was not a massage, I would not even take it for free, a big waste of money, too expensive even for a groupon. I've had better massages for free!!! Never have this service without checking out the reviews for a place. I am appalled to read other people actually got injured!!!

35.description: Been to this location twice.  First visit was "OK" but the second visit was aweful!  I had a couples massage with my fiance and requested a deep tissue massage.  The massage was more an aggressive back run, which gave me red burn marks all over my neck and back, than a massage.  The masseuse was very nice and asked me several times if the massage was ok, which were the moments I told let him know that it wasn't and needed to be more firm.   After, the masseuse's apologized and said to make sure to tell the front desk that the massage was not good and that they should compensate me in some way.  After I told them the sitation they treated me as if It was my fault and that I shouldve asked for a new masseuse, even though we didn't have other options when we booked as they told us they only had the 2 available (1 male, 1 female).  They said theyd have the manager contact me, which has not yet happened (this was over 2 weeks ago now).  I was going to wait to review until I got something back, but it seems they don't care.  The worst is that we had a 90 minute groupon we purchased, which we didn't use since they could only squeeze us in for 60 minutes, and now have a couples massage we need to use...

19.description: Every time i try and use my 90 min massage they have a excuse. I went there last week and booked an appt. and when the therapist saw me she said sorry i am not doing it for that long!I have used the same therapist for 3 years ...how rude! And the manager just said sorry...Reschedule with someone else she's in a bad mood!

28.description: I have been here a couple of times for massages. My most recent massage was horrible. Like everyone, I carry a lot of tension in my shoulders and back and I requested that the massage focus on these areas. My masseuse did not find many of my knots--which I know are there because they are always there and everyone finds them. When he did find a knot he attacked it with great force. He did not use enough oil so it was very dry and pinched me when he did attack the knots. When he was not hurting me he was resting his hands on my back with little to no pressure which felt awkward and like a waste of time. My arms were left hanging off the sides of the table for a long time, and my feet were uncovered and cold for most of the time. He did not ask how it was, didn't offer me water after and left the building before I had even paid. His technique was different from every massage I have ever gotten and was asymmetrical. I even looked him up to make sure he is licensed (he is).

45.description: Overall I'd recommend it, although I can't compare it in Chicago. The location is pretty convenient, a couple of blocks from the red line. You walk in and the reception staff are friendly. I'd recommend getting there early--I got there on time, and it took a fewminutes to get in and get set up, and my massage stopped 90 minutes from my appointment time, regardless of how long I was actually on the table. The massage was good, the pressure I asked for, and it didn't make me feel perfect, but it actually did reduce some knots. My masseuse was very professional, and we talked about what I wanted to focus on beforehand. the room felt a bit cold, but any part of me not being worked on was nicely covered by a towel and blanket, and the table was heated. I didn't smell any aroma, so I'm not sure about the aromatherapy, but that was fine. Afterwards they give you a single bathroom to change in, and it has a nice steam shower. I think they siad they validate parking, and that it's $15 validated.

33.description: My wifey and I came here with a Groupon and have to say it was a great experience.   My therapist was Virginia, my wife's Lynn.  The therapist's are very considerate, and very good and thorough with their technique.  I felt a little sore in my calves after having the knots worked out.  I still felt better when I left than when I walked in - the ultimate compliment, not?   Great steam shower was offered afterwards.  We will definitely return.  Hope they can offer loyalty discounts in the future.

43.description: Went for my 90-minute massage today, and was pleasantly surprised (thanks, Groupon!). Made my reservation last night, and they were able to accommodate my requests (time + female therapist). Sheila was very knowledgeable and very good! she made sure that I was comfortable (temperature, pressure, exposure), she asked where my problem areas were (it's my shoulders), and she took time kneading out those stubborn muscle knots. She was very pleasant, too. I've been to a lot of Spas in the city, and I would say that she did better that the higher end ones that I've been to. I just wish that the products they use are nicer.. Tip: Take advantage of the complimentary steam shower!Highly recommended!:) Btw, tips are cash only... make sure you have some on hand for the great service!:p

2.description: Great parlor,Staff is courteous and quite attentive.i highly recommend this spot.Ask for Mari or CatheringCheers and enjoy

18.description: My boyfriend got me some sort of package deal with a Massage, Mani-Pedi, and a Facial. I also got my hair colored once here. My first impression was that the front desk staff could be friendlier.Mani-Pedi: above average-Clean tools and facility-Massage chair-Lots of color optionsMassage: LOVED IT (although it was my 1st so I can't compare it with anything)-Relaxing music-Comfortable bed-HEATED blankets underneath my body, which was amazing. The best part: A complimentary steam shower after my massage! I left feeling unbelievably relaxed.Hair Color: pretty basicThere is only one woman who does hair here and and was very nice. I wasn't thrilled with the result but I didn't hate it either. I can't wait to go back for my Facial, but I have had some trouble making an appointment. I believe they only have one esthetician. I will definitely be returning for body services, just not hair services.m

41.description: This is the 2nd of 2 great experiences here with a great massage. Steam shower is just icing on the cake!

52.description: I reserved a couple massage for me and my boyfriend yesterday afternoon. The site itself was cute and clean.  The receptionist was nice, unfortunately the massage was just ok. The massage was a little sloppy, no rhythm and not a very relaxing one. My boyfriend said his massage was ok. It feels like they were new and just learning. I bought the Groupon to try an establishment and I thought that's a good way to promote their place. So if I'm not gonna get the massage I paid for, there's other places I could spend my money on. I didn't made a fuss about it yesterday  since I don't wanna ruin my boyfriend birthday. We only found out their names after the massage when we asked the receptionist.. Michelle and Sabrina. Sorry but I tried a lot of places before this and I wasn't impressed.

50.description: So relaxed and refreshed! We had a 90 minute couples with a groupon. The service was friendly and on time. Our masseuses, Isa and Sabrina, were very very good. My husband fell asleep within 10 minutes! After the massage they offered us the steam shower which was a great way to end the afternoon! The only drawback was that the rooms were cold. Other than that it was a great deal and fun experience!

4.description: This place is top notch! In terms of first impressions, I can only say extremely positive things about the ladies on the front desk (Monika particularly); they are amazingly organised, extremely professional, friendly, attentive, courteous and as customer focused as it gets. The therapists are all excellent - it is clear that they are all very experienced and expert at their craft. I can honestly say that in the time that I have been going to Heavenly Massage, I have never had a bad experience. There is never an issue with the length of the session or usual niggles that you come across with some places. The facilities are immaculate and comfortable; it is always nice to finish a therapy with a steam shower. I am normally the fussy type, but, would not hesitate in recommending this place to anyone that is looking for a great massage experience in a welcoming and friendly environment.

6.description: The best deep tissue I have had, and I have had a lot of them.   Yufen is amazing, I highly recommend her.  I went back again for a swedish massage and was lucky enough to get Yufen again, just as amazing.Thanks!oh and the steam showers are a total bonus.

22.description: My boyfriend got me some sort of package deal with a Massage, Mani-Pedi, and a Facial. I also got my hair colored once here. My first impression was that the front desk staff could be friendlier.Mani-Pedi: above average-Clean tools and facility-Massage chair-Lots of color optionsMassage: LOVED IT (although it was my 1st so I can't compare it with anything)-Relaxing music-Comfortable bed-HEATED blankets underneath my body, which was amazing. The best part: A complimentary steam shower after my massage! I left feeling unbelievably relaxed.Hair Color: pretty basicThere is only one woman who does hair here and and was very nice. I wasn't thrilled with the result but I didn't hate it either. I can't wait to go back for my Facial, but I have had some trouble making an appointment. I believe they only have one esthetician. I will definitely be returning for body services, just not hair services.m

15.description: I called to make an appointment to use the 90 minute massage groupon and the receptionist have me a range of options available for that service. After picking 6 pm, she asked for my name and number. I show up at 6 for the massage and not only am I not scheduled, but they close in one hour. They try and tell me it must have been with a different location but I confirmed with them that the number I called was indeed their own. Neither receptionist apologized and instead kept trying to put me at fault. Bad sign when they can't even accurately schedule an appointment. A monkey could perform that job.

57.description: Redeemed my Groupon for 90 minute massage with Vic. I thoroughly enjoyed my massage!Courteous front desk staff.Nice ambiance, very clean and spacious.They also have a separate area for manicures/pedicures.

20.description: Rates this place for 5 stars because of Gemme and the steam shower. She is so good and nice. Most importantly, she listens to my concerns and requests. Love the steam room. I have been to several massage places in Chicago, but I will come back here because of Gemme and the steam shower. I felt like a cloud walking out of this place. I live 5 mins away from this place,and I thought I couldn't get home fast enough to fall asleep. It was how relaxed it is!!!

36.description: This was my first massage EVER and I'm so glad it was here! I'm actually visiting from LA and wanted a massage because I was so tense (in LA, we don't walk this much!) I found this place on GroupOn, and it was such a great deal! It was $60 for 1.5 hours, which is AMAZING. Normally it's $120.Gaby (Gabby?) was the one who gave me a massage and ah I loved it! She was also extremely friendly. So so glad she made my first experience so great and wanting to go back! The only reason I gave it 4 was because I've only came here once. Can't wait to get another massage and hopefully it'll be as good as this time!!

14.description: I just had one of the best body scrubs of my life. I have been to many spas over the past ten years and had many treatments. But the level of detail and care by Kasia exceeded my expectations.  Thanks again for a great treatment.

58.description: Wow! What an awesome experience! I can't say enough about how great my time was at this salon! I was warmly greeted by the very pleasant staff as soon as I walked in. They hung my coat and offered me wine and mimosas (loved having drinks while waiting and getting my nails done!). My nail tech was awesome! She was super friendly and did an amazing job on my mani pedi. I am super picky about the shape of my nails and the perfection with which they are polished. I cannot stop looking at my nails! They are gorgeous! I got regular polish this time but would like to try the no chip next time since they get such rave reviews for this as well. Pricing was about the same as anywhere else so that was a plus. What an awesome experience! After trying more than a few places in the downtown Chicago area, this is my new nail salon home! :)

56.description: Highly recommend!  A friend and I took Friday off as a vacation day and she suggested we go out for lunch and get a pedicure.  I did a search for nail salons between where I live in River North and Tavern on Rush where we planned to have lunch.  STIL came up as one of the options and had glowing reviews.  At $53 their price was higher than some of the storefront options but we decided to pamper ourselves and boy did we make the right decision!.  Our great experience started when I called that morning to see if they could fit the two of us in at the same time that day.  I spoke with Ilva who said they might be able to - she offered to call another client to see if she could come in a half-hour later for her appointment. She called back 15 minutes later and said they could take both of us at 2p.  Clearly she didn't need to do that, but it showed great customer service as well as being a smart business decision since they could get two more customers that afternoon.After a leisurely lunch, we walked over and were warmly greeted when we arrived and offered a glass of wine or champagne to enjoy with our pedicures. (That price differential just went down!)  Great selection of colors to choose from and then we settled in on the comfy chairs.  Ilva asked if we just wanted to talk or if we wanted magazines and then brought us our People and Star magazines.  Ilva and Gigi did our pedicures and did a fabulous job.  The salon itself is beautiful (modern without being pretentious) and the staff is amazing.  We'll definitely be back.  Thank you Ilva and Gigi!

29.description: This was my first time at this salon and I have to say, this was the best experience I've ever had with having my nails done! I was hesitant at first due to the higher prices but I have to say -  they really care about their customers!I called one week in advance to schedule an appointment for a no-chip mani/pedi at 0900 am, as I would have been in the area after work. Although there was no availability, Ilva went ahead and accommodated my request anyway (how nice)! I was immediately greeted with a warm welcome by Ilva and offered a much needed mimosa :) Cindy was so detailed and definitely took her time working on my nails. It also helped that my empty mimosa glass was replaced with a glass of wine! I was thrilled with the way my nails looked and before I left, Ilva came by to let me know I could come back anytime if my no-chip didn't last prior to the guaranteed two weeks. Overall, this salon exceeded my expectations by far and I have already scheduled another appointment in two weeks, along with a European facial! I can tell this is going to be my new go-to place.

42.description: best no chip manicure I have ever had. Just like the other reviews state- the no chip here  actually does not chip. The only reason Im giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I was not impressed with my pedicure at all. Maybe its because I had one of the new girls train on my feet, but I did not care for it especially for the high price I paid.  I would definitely come back to get a no chip here again and get my pedi somewhere else.

23.description: Log overdue review of my favorite salon and spa! The service is top-notch and I wouldn't trade Ilva doing my nails ever. Truly the best finger pampering anywhere.

47.description: I work at a high school & we had a meeting downtown... our school prom was the next day so when we broke for the day I decided that it would be easier (albeit more expensive) to get a pedicure done there.Found STIL on Yelp -- wanted a no-chip because it was ridiculously cold even for May & I didn't want to mess up my toenails when I'd have to put my socks & shoes back on. Other reviewers were spot on, this salon is great.The receptionist & manicurist (Eastern European woman, didn't get her name) were so very friendly. I was on a time crunch & they squeezed me in. Girlfriend's no chip pedicure was FLAWLESS. Dry cuticles completely gone, polish application was beautiful (got a dark teal color).The sticker shock, though, gave me a headache. $75 & that was without tip!!!! Ugh!! I was pinched for time so I rationalized that I was paying for the convenience, but I highly doubt I will return. The 5 stars are for the impeccable service & the friendly staff. (One star for the cost, but I can't blame them for me getting a pedicure on the Gold Coast in the first place. Highly recommend to those with the budget.)

8.description: I chose this nail salon based on the almost 5 star ratings. Unfortunately, I had a different experience. The manicure and manicurist I and my friend had earned only 1 star. They don't soak your hands, the massage lasts about 40 seconds, we had to direct her through each step- including to file all nails evening and asking for the dryer. It was horrible. Although the salon was clean, the feeling of it was inimical and inhospitable as it seemed like a social hour for their frequenters and they didn't interact with us- which would be ok if they weren't telling their life stories to the people next to them and the people next to them. This was not a private event, people came and went. Maybe they give better service to their "regulars" but I would not recommend them.

31.description: I came here for a no chip and after 10 days, it still looks perfect (except that my nails are growing out fast!). Everyone was friendly, and I got in right on time. It took about 1 hour. I saw Holly, and she was great.  It was the end of the day, and I was a bit worried that the quality might suffer from a tired manicurist. But she took her time, and created a perfect french manicure (she was even so pleased with it herself that she took a picture of it afterwards).  I will definitely go back!

34.description: I visited this salon with friends for my wedding a few months ago. I no longer live in Chicago, and had no clue where to go for a mani/pedi when I was in town for my wedding, but took a chance with booking an appointment here to get my nails done. Definitely a good call! It's well-located and is such a cute salon. I wasn't sure what color to choose for my gel mani, and left it up to the stylist after describing my preferences. She layered a couple shades of white and light purple that looked beautiful in person and in photos. My nails lasted over two weeks, even after 10 days of playing on the beach. The ladies that work there were friendly and gracious, and worked to accommodate a friend that added an additional service while there. They offered mimosas and treats while we got ready, and really made it a fun event for my group.  If I still lived in the area, I would definitely make this my go-to place for mani/pedis.

16.description: Fantastic Service! My wife and I walked in to STIL after reading Yelp reviews. There were no availabilities but Eva called every good salon and finally found one that had an opening. She went above and beyond for a new out of town client. I would give her 6 stars if available!

13.description: A haven of tranquil pampering. Excellent booking and management service, I love Stella for reminding me of appointments and being so accommodating when my schedule changes. As far as nail techs go, Becky is the greatest person, and best nail artist. She makes me so happy!!! Biosculpt manis last so long and my nails are stronger than ever. Before Becky, I did not understand what people meant by their nails "growing out," because my gel manis would always peel off after about 10 days. Now they last so long-- like they don't chip or peel for three weeks-- and I actually MISS talking with Becky so I go back and she works her magic once again. (: I never feel like I need a mani because my nails are so fresh for so long with her perfect biosculpt application. Good color options, super clean, nice building on a nice street- view into barneys and Vera wang bridal salon across the street! Free bridal magazines to take home, free tea and wine and champagne.

11.description: I made an appointment last minute (as in I was getting on the train and called for an appointment 20 minutes later) and they didn't have a problem taking me in. They are pretty fancy... Which I should have expected based on their location, but still. Pretty fancy. My technician was also named Tammy and she was great. Their prices are a little higher than my preferred neighborhood salon, but definitely still manageable.

39.description: First time here and found out about this salon on Yelp, even though I live around the corner. Better than I even expected! Love the staff, style and service. Michelle did a fabulous job with my Mani and Pedi. Don't hesitate, you will be just as thrilled as I am!

37.description: Visited this place a few weeks ago with friends as part of our girls night out. We had four massages booked and they were able to accommodate two at a time. The place had a casual, comfortable atmosphere and we were treated to some bubbly while waiting. My masseuse was Elio. He was amazing. This man has some powerful hands. I would definitely book with him again.The price for the massage was a very reasonable $90 for an hour. The only complaint I have is that we were treated about 20 minutes later than scheduled and it made us late for a dinner reservation. But overall, a very good experience. Bring cash for gratuity, they do not allow tips to be charged.

0.description: One of the owners Stela visits my place of work and her nails are ALWAYS on point, so when I asked her about where she went and she told me herself and her sister had a salon I HAD to go. I went to STĪL a week ago today and got a Gelish no-chip manicure and a regular pedicure. I learned some very helpful tips about no-chip nail services. First of all, Shellac, Gelish, + OPI are all brands that produce a type of no-chip gel polish. Each brand uses different ways to produce their no-chip polishes and due to this, removing them from nails may have different processes. This is helpful for me to understand so that when a nail tech asks me what brand I have on my nails, I can help her to remove it properly without damaging my nails as she will understand what is needed based on the brand of no-chip I have on my nails. From my understanding, Gelish + Shellac brands use a softer type of formulation that is easier to remove than brands that use a harder more chalky formulae like OPI. Keep this shit in mind the next time you get a no-chip service as this helps the nail tech better remove your no-chip saving you time and damage to your nails. I do hope that helps someone out there! Now on to my experience:I got into STĪL at 9am to get my mani/pedi with Iris. Iris is super sweet and when I tell you she got all the dry skin off my feet I mean she got "to work on Myra's feet!" If you've never watched Martin, that last line won't be funny to you + you don't have any idea what I'm talking about. In other words, my feet were cleaned up, perfectly polished, no dry skin in sight. I had some issues getting my previous no-chip mani removed (by OPI and I had no idea I had OPI as I specifically asked for a Shellac no-chip but Stela educated me on how nail shops will just give you whatever no-chip brand of polish they offer regardless of what you ask for if you're not clear on the differences in the brands of polishes). I do prefer the Gelish or Shellac as they are softer gel no-chip polishes. Stela made sure to take care of me and my nails and after Iris painted them perfectly, she double-checked them to be sure that they were perfect. The customer service is impeccable AND my nails... I am really in love with them. I feel like they really care about the actual health of the nail as well as the aesthetic. I haven't frequented many nail salons as I just feel like so many don't get it and my nails have been ruined to look just ok for a week or two, but STĪL GETS IT. The interior is beautiful and they offer you a variety of beverages: coffee, water, tea. I really feel like I've found my home shop as they even do designs. I'm so happy Stela came into my workplace so that I could find her shop! Thank you ladies!!!

38.description: I got the European Facial here with Chloe and it was probably one of the best facials I've received. She extracted all of my blackheads on my nose. The extractions were uncomfortable, like all extractions are, but not painful. I did not experience redness or breakouts afterwards and my pores are noticeably smaller. I would definitely go again! The one draw back is that they only take tips in cash, so make sure you bring some cash with you.

51.description: The best facial I have EVER had! Amber (aka Chloe) was so amazing! She listened to all of my concerns and really cared about them! She was so nice and friendly unlike other places that just get you in and out. She even walked me up to the medspa upstairs to introduce me to the staff where I was going for Botox. I was so impressed with the professionalism, upscale décor and the front desk. After visiting Amber I can honestly say that I walk down the street more confident than ever before. Life changing! Thank you thank you thank you! I will be back as long as you are there!

27.description: The reviews on Yelp were all correct. This place is great! I was able to squeeze in a last minute appointment with Nina for a no-chip pedicure and I love it! Plus she is so nice!I liked my toes so much that I wanted a no chip manicure and Ilva was so nice to fit me in the next day between appointments. She knew I had somewhere to be at 7pm and worked so quickly to get me in and out. Plus, my nails look amazing!Thank you both!

32.description: After my previous review, the salon contacted me to apologize for me not receiving and being charged for the Spa Pedicure.  They even went the extra mile to extend the offer of a complimentary spa pedicure at my next visit.  In regards to my no chip manicure, I have to say it was the best no chip I've ever had.  I soaked off the no chip a day before my appointment, mainly to assess if my nails were harmed at all by the product, since my nails usually peel after a no chip.  I was very pleasantly surprised.  Not only was there no damage to my nails, they seemed especially strong! And, as promised, they did not chip. I went back for my second appointment, again for a spa pedicure and no chip manicure.  Difference this time was that I had severely broken a toe nail and was prepared to tough it out for a few weeks of no toe polish as the nail (it's my big toe) grew back out.  I mentioned my broken toe nail, and as my pedicure was starting they looked at the nail and said they could do a repair, both to protect the toe nail from splitting as well as allowing me to wear toe nail polish (yeah!).  The spa pedicure this time was quite different.  Very pampering and everything I would expect.  Before the polish was applied, my big toe nail was repaired - you can't even tell there is a repair. Best of all, I now am sporting very fetching polished piggies.My fingers again look great!  As long as there continues to be no damageto my nails, I am a convert to STIL's no chip manicure.I have to give credit to the salon for making the effort to make things right.  The pedicure was complimentary - including the nail repair (which, by all rights, I should have been charged) and the no chip was again well worth the $50. I will definitely be back!  Thanks STIL salon for taking great care of me and my nails.

54.description: I am a devoted client of Maya's who just joined the STIL hair care team.  Maya has cut my hair for 6 years and every time I leave I couldn't be happier.  I recently moved to St. Louis, had my hair cut once there, and decided I would just need to travel to see Maya in Chicago every few months.  My hair looks great whether I blow dry it or just let it air dry.  Go see Maya! You won't be sorry.  And get a manicure while you're at it!

48.description: Maya is great ! She introduced me to a subtle men's color that is natural and no one seems to notice that I had a color. Several compliments lately on my appearance, thanks Maya ! Also Maya listens well and tries to provide the best haircut possible. I love the place and the people there.

44.description: I stumbled upon Stil through yelp because I was looking for a place near my apartment to get a no-chip manicure. This place is wonderful! The people are so nice and most of all they do a fantastic job. They did not over file my nails or cut my cuticles too much (which I hate). The atmosphere is really pleasant. They always offer you a drink when you arrive. I've only had a no-chip manicure there but I have been really happy every time. They are really fantastic at suggesting colors and listening to what my needs are as opposed to picking what they like. It is a little pricey but honestly the service, convenience and great manicure is worth it in my opinion, especially for a no-chip. FYI when you arrive you have to go in the door next to Prada and go up the elevator to the floor marked with their name. Also, they give you a discount for your entire birthday month!

24.description: This review is long overdue...I was very excited to try Stil. Every year for my birthday I like to splurge on a nice massage. Last year I went to the Dana Hotel for a massage and I guess they set the bar extremely high because I was unbelievably disappointed with Stil. Whoever I made the reservation with over the phone was very pleasant. The spa itself is a little harder to find because there's only a small sign outside. My friend Joanne and I arrived and waited at the front desk for awhile before we were greeted. The waiting area itself is pretty cute- a little warm though because the sun beats in through the window. While waiting I was expecting to w offered a beverage- many of the reviews I read prior to our visit said that they were offered wine while waiting. No one even offered us water. I have a feeling it's because my friend and I look so young- but c'mon, at least ask...I am used to the spas where you're given a robe and slippers and wait in lounges where there are drinks and nibbles before you're taken to the massage room. This place doesn't offer anything like that. My masseuse came to retrieve me from the lobby and took me to a very tiny room for my massage. She finally offered me water but she didn't give it to me until I was already lying naked face down on the massage table. Have you tried drinking water lying down on your stomach without exposing your boobs to the masseuse? Not easy! She then asked me what kind of pressure I wanted then went on to tell me about how awesome she was and how she "invented" the extreme deep pressure massage. Congratulations sweetheart- but I didn't come here to hear about your life. I came here for a massage.The massage itself wasn't bad but I've definitely had better. After the massage she left and since they didn't have robes/shower areas I was forced to put my clothing back on over my oil covered body. So gross. The masseuse didn't come back to check on me like they normally do (almost all other masseuses I've had greet you at the door with a glass of water). I saw my friend in the hall and we walked to the front desk where no one helped us for almost 10 minutes. We seriously considered just leaving because we were both so pissed and no one was helping us anyways. Finally some lady asks us "is there something I can help you with?" With a snotty tone- again probably because my friend and I look like teenagers. I said sure, you can help us if you want us to pay you for the massages. She then decided to get someone else to help us instead. Maybe we were asking too much?This was probably the worst massage experience I've ever had. They should stick to doing manis and pedis only. Leave the massages to the real spas. My biggest regret is that my friend wasted all this money to get a crappy experience for MY birthday. We'll be sticking to Dana.

7.description: I got my nails done for my wedding at STIL. The nails looks great and the manicurist worked to find a perfect color (actually two overlaid). Overall it was a clean, nice salon and I'd recommend it to others.

49.description: So, I stumbled upon STIL while searching Yelp for a nail salon that looked like I would have a very relaxing experience as well as a top notch mani/pedi. STIL DID NOT DISAPPOINT. This place is EXTRAORDINARY. The staff is sooooo welcoming and warm, they just made me feel so at ease. Joanna did my nails and she's awesome! She took her time and really paid attention to detail.My manicure and no chip pedicure are, hands down, the best I've ever had.......no exaggeration! Oh, did I mention the mimosas?????? They're awesome as well! STIL's prices are a little higher than some other places, but It's definitely worth it! I got an out-of-this world hand massage, 2 delicious mimosas, 5 hour parking garage validation for $14, and the best mani and no chip pedi I've ever had in my life...........I'll definitely be back!!!!!

40.description: I decided to try out Stil based on a recommendation from a co-worker.  I called for a same day appointment on a Thurs and they were able to take me later that day.  Everyone was very friendly and they even offered me a glass of wine.  Holly did my no chip and I was very satisfied with how they turned out.  Usually I'm lucky to get 2 weeks out of a no chip before they start peeling, but I almost made it 3 weeks!  I get a ton of compliments and have been back since.  While it's a little pricier than I would like, I enjoy the ambiance of the salon as well as Holly's service that I will continue coming back!!

53.description: I have been going to Ilva for almost seven years. I get a no chip manicure and pedicure every 3 to 6 weeks. Ilva is professional and has trained half of Chicago on the art of no chip. Her full service spa is top class and not over priced! They are fantastic people with exceptional service!!!

30.description: Being a regular 2 week no chip wearer and traveling every week I'm pretty particular about nail salon's. Finding Stil was the a SCORE!!!! Holly did an excellent job and dabbed my toes with some glitter. The T-W discount is a sweet deal and falls into my budget. I called yesterday at 9Am and they were able yo accommodate an appt after work, ad I requested.  Already booked my next appt. The salon is clean, chic, and fun.

46.description: I just arrived in town and needed to get a pedicure - I came in to Stil because it was rated high on Yelp and near my hotel.  The hotel concierge had recommended a different place but I went with my gut and came to Stil because when I had called from the airport to make sure they were open on Sunday - the receptionist was super nice and I told her I was flying in and wanted to come there for a pedicure and she thanked me - I was already being treated well and I hadn't even arrived!  Upon my arrival - I was greeted well and only had to wait about 5 min as a walk-in with no appointment.  The place is very nicely done - great decor and great view as it sits on the 4th floor.  I was pleasantly surprised when I was seated for my treatment and offered champaign or wine!  Roxanne provided my pedicure service and she did a wonderful job - she is very detail orientated and has a sweet demeanor.  I am very particular and I highly recommend this salon - my experience was relaxing and my feet received the star treatment.

1.description: Was able to get a Christmas Eve appointment for a no chip manicure. Upon arrival I was promptly led to the station and was told that Iris would be my manicurist. I was offered water, coffee or a Mimosa. I chose a green tea because it was a bit too early for me to partake in a Mimosa.Now for the service:Don't expect them to soak your nails in warm water. That was my first time with one like that and thought it was a little odd, but what the heck, they had good reviews. Iris did a great job on my nails. She was meticulous and took the time to make sure that I liked my color and that it looked perfect. I wasn't even done with my manicure and I was getting the first of many compliments on my nails. Iris wasn't a big conversationalist and I loved it.My only gripe is that on the promotions page they advertised a $40 no chip until December 31st, but I was charged $50. I don't know, maybe I didn't read the fine print.Overall, I thought that I received a great manicure and the ambience was really nice. Make sure that you bring your own scrub brush when you need to wash your hands before polish application because they don't provide one.

55.description: I absolutely loved the space even before getting anything done. A warm welcome from the owner and a posh service from Ilva one of the partners. I have already told my friends how wonderful this place is and can't wait to go back!

9.description: Hidden gem of a salon. I went there with a girlfriend last night for a mani pedi and was thoroughly impressed! First of all, they take appointments, which is fantastic (you can even make them online) and we made ours the day of! My nail experience elsewhere typically involves adding our names to a list and not being able to add my friend until she gets there and waiting around with 10 other girls for a nail technician to open up. It's a huge game of trying to time it so you can sit next to each other, because the whole point is getting your nails done together so you can chat and catch up, which rarely ends up happening. Usually you end up at different times or sitting farther away from each other. The salon was quiet, no one sitting around waiting, except your technician who was there and ready to go when you got there. Victoria, who did my manicure and pedicure was a complete perfectionist! All of the women working there, including the woman working reception and Victoria were very friendly. The salon is clean, quiet, relaxing, and so far from the experiences I had elsewhere I was blown away. The best surprise was they have excellent pricing!! They had some specials going on and my friend's no chip was only $35! Here it is in the middle of the Gold Coast with no wait, you're able to get in whenever you want, sit next to your friend, they do a perfect job, and it's well priced! I was blown away! We will definitely be back!

26.description: This review is for eyelash extensions done by Amber. I came to her serendipitously and what a smart, professional, funny, and down to earth woman she is. I have worn eyelash extensions pretty regularly for about two years. I began after a heart-wrenching, down-on-your-knees breakup. Eyelash extensions, believe it or not, were the perfect little umph to open my eyes to the world and myself, post-man. Ever since, I love wearing them. I'm happy without them but LOVE wearing them. Repeat, repeat, repeat.With a crazy travel schedule, I let my lashes go and returned from Florida ready to put them back on and batt my eyes through the summer. On a silly whim I bought a groupon for ultra-discounted lashes at another business thus beginning my journey into the worst lash job i ever had (cheap glue, lash breaking, clumping, varied length and curls nightmare).ENTER AMBER. She warmly welcomed me as a new client without a long wait to see her. I laid back on her table, she ran a brush through my lashes, and confirmed my suspicion: a lot of damage had been done to my lashes on my little groupon foray. She got to work and when I sat up-- MAGIC. ABSOLUTE MAGIC. No one would have ever known the trauma my lashes had been through. Amber offered me a few tips for lash health and care and sent me on my way.I left with a big grin on my face and SMILING EYES. Gone are my days of unknown rando salons with groupon deals. I'm an Amber devotee all the way. She is a class act.

25.description: I found STIL by doing a google search for best manicure in Chicago and following the five star yelp reviews. Perfect location, the most professional and friendly front desk, and THE BEST manicure and pedicure I've ever gotten. I'm addicted and I have heard everyone there does a great job and I believe it! I had my first mani/pedi there in March 2014 with HOLLY and I haven't booked with anyone else since she's amazing and I've literally never ever had such amazing high quality long lasting, cuticle friendly and consistently excellent no-chips and pedicures.

12.description: This review is long overdue...I was very excited to try Stil. Every year for my birthday I like to splurge on a nice massage. Last year I went to the Dana Hotel for a massage and I guess they set the bar extremely high because I was unbelievably disappointed with Stil. Whoever I made the reservation with over the phone was very pleasant. The spa itself is a little harder to find because there's only a small sign outside. My friend Joanne and I arrived and waited at the front desk for awhile before we were greeted. The waiting area itself is pretty cute- a little warm though because the sun beats in through the window. While waiting I was expecting to w offered a beverage- many of the reviews I read prior to our visit said that they were offered wine while waiting. No one even offered us water. I have a feeling it's because my friend and I look so young- but c'mon, at least ask...I am used to the spas where you're given a robe and slippers and wait in lounges where there are drinks and nibbles before you're taken to the massage room. This place doesn't offer anything like that. My masseuse came to retrieve me from the lobby and took me to a very tiny room for my massage. She finally offered me water but she didn't give it to me until I was already lying naked face down on the massage table. Have you tried drinking water lying down on your stomach without exposing your boobs to the masseuse? Not easy! She then asked me what kind of pressure I wanted then went on to tell me about how awesome she was and how she "invented" the extreme deep pressure massage. Congratulations sweetheart- but I didn't come here to hear about your life. I came here for a massage.The massage itself wasn't bad but I've definitely had better. After the massage she left and since they didn't have robes/shower areas I was forced to put my clothing back on over my oil covered body. So gross. The masseuse didn't come back to check on me like they normally do (almost all other masseuses I've had greet you at the door with a glass of water). I saw my friend in the hall and we walked to the front desk where no one helped us for almost 10 minutes. We seriously considered just leaving because we were both so pissed and no one was helping us anyways. Finally some lady asks us "is there something I can help you with?" With a snotty tone- again probably because my friend and I look like teenagers. I said sure, you can help us if you want us to pay you for the massages. She then decided to get someone else to help us instead. Maybe we were asking too much?This was probably the worst massage experience I've ever had. They should stick to doing manis and pedis only. Leave the massages to the real spas. My biggest regret is that my friend wasted all this money to get a crappy experience for MY birthday. We'll be sticking to Dana.

59.description: I came here for my 30th birthday with my 3 closest friends as part of a girls birthday weekend and I can't say enough about how amazing the ladies are. I made the appointment with Stella who worked out a deal for us to get group mani/pedis and insured there would be enough technicians on staff for the four of us. Ava/Eva (sp?) and Joanna were particularly sweet. It felt like everyone in the salon was taking care of us, helping us pick nail colors, chatting with us, and making sure we were comfortable. Did I mention there is (apparently bottomless) champagne and candy?

21.description: Did a quick search on Yelp for a place to get my nails done up for a wedding and landed on Stil - I wanted to go in for a no-chip but have had bad no-chip experiences elsewhere and was short on time, so I figured I'd take Stil for a test drive with the "Full Manicure".  They took me for a same day appointment, which I really appreciate.The salon is clean, bright, well-decorated.  The staff all seem friendly and kind. I barely sat down to wait before they took me on a tour to choose my polish and offered me water (not the legendary mimosa).  My nail tech was lovely: she took her time shaping my nails and making sure they were even, was gentle with my cuticles, and paid attention to detail when applying the polish and cleaning up the mistakes, which I really appreciate.I can't speak to the "de-stressing hand massage" because I didn't receive one!  I didn't say anything at the time because I figured I had misread the description of the service (I hadn't).  I wish I had said something!  It should have been included and is one of my favorite parts of receiving a manicure.Aside from being disappointed about not getting the full services I paid for, I'm otherwise happy with the manicure.  I left the salon looking like I my nails had been done by a professional, which is the most important part.  I'll probably go in for the no-chip (especially because every service is 20% off during your birth month, wish I knew that ahead of time!) and I'd love to give a full five stars, but not for incomplete service!

17.description: This review is for eyelash extensions done by Amber. I came to her serendipitously and what a smart, professional, funny, and down to earth woman she is. I have worn eyelash extensions pretty regularly for about two years. I began after a heart-wrenching, down-on-your-knees breakup. Eyelash extensions, believe it or not, were the perfect little umph to open my eyes to the world and myself, post-man. Ever since, I love wearing them. I'm happy without them but LOVE wearing them. Repeat, repeat, repeat.With a crazy travel schedule, I let my lashes go and returned from Florida ready to put them back on and batt my eyes through the summer. On a silly whim I bought a groupon for ultra-discounted lashes at another business thus beginning my journey into the worst lash job i ever had (cheap glue, lash breaking, clumping, varied length and curls nightmare).ENTER AMBER. She warmly welcomed me as a new client without a long wait to see her. I laid back on her table, she ran a brush through my lashes, and confirmed my suspicion: a lot of damage had been done to my lashes on my little groupon foray. She got to work and when I sat up-- MAGIC. ABSOLUTE MAGIC. No one would have ever known the trauma my lashes had been through. Amber offered me a few tips for lash health and care and sent me on my way.I left with a big grin on my face and SMILING EYES. Gone are my days of unknown rando salons with groupon deals. I'm an Amber devotee all the way. She is a class act.

10.description: Stayed in a hotel close by and my mom and I made an appointment, they could not have been more pleasant  and 4 days later my nails are still lovely!

5.description: I had the pleasure of getting a pedicure from STIL on my 5 year anniversary and their service went well beyond my expectations. I was greeted at the front desk by the Stella asking if I'd like a glass of wine or champaign as soon as I checked in. That helped set the tone for the next hour+. The pedicure was fantastic and was so relaxing. Everything they have done with the salon screams class from the check-in experience to their services. I would most definitely go back.

3.description: I'm on like my 12th round of nails from Stil. I absolutely love each and every one of the creations that I get. I've only had one less than stellar experience and even that's on me for not saying anything about it. Every women at Stil is knowledgeable, talented, and responsive to the needs of clients. The one time I did go somewhere else when I was out of town (a place I had been before and loved) I was extremely disappointed. Shoulda waited for STIL!

35.description: I've been getting manis here for a while now (p.s. ask for Nina - she is amazing!!!) and couldn't say anything but great things about this place. The people here are so friendly and funny to talk to and I've loved my mani experience. The ambience is super friendly, and the nice people at the front desk always ask if I want something to drink and they take my coat, etc. and make me feel super welcome. Nina has always taken really great care of my nails!  and I'm amazed by how long a regular mani (NOT a gel / no-chip) will last without chipping!! A regular mani will last a week without chipping which is totally unheard of from other nail places. Love it!!

19.description: So, I stumbled upon STIL while searching Yelp for a nail salon that looked like I would have a very relaxing experience as well as a top notch mani/pedi. STIL DID NOT DISAPPOINT. This place is EXTRAORDINARY. The staff is sooooo welcoming and warm, they just made me feel so at ease. Joanna did my nails and she's awesome! She took her time and really paid attention to detail.My manicure and no chip pedicure are, hands down, the best I've ever had.......no exaggeration! Oh, did I mention the mimosas?????? They're awesome as well! STIL's prices are a little higher than some other places, but It's definitely worth it! I got an out-of-this world hand massage, 2 delicious mimosas, 5 hour parking garage validation for $14, and the best mani and no chip pedi I've ever had in my life...........I'll definitely be back!!!!!

28.description: Great place with a super friendly staff. My daughter and I were visiting Chicago for a week and really wanted a little spa time. Stil was perfect. We called in the morning and they fit us right in for an afternoon mani pedi. The place is pretty but not too overly done and the staff was really nice and very attentive. Plus I have to say my nails have never looked better! Prices are on the high side but not too outrageous. We will definitely come back the next time we are in town.

45.description: This place was amazing! My friend recently got engaged so I wanted to bring her somewhere special to get a mani-pedi to pamper her. This place was amazing and the technicians were top-notch. I had Joanna who was so friendly and professional. I got glitter polish on my toenails and she spent extra time making sure the glitter wasn't anywhere on my skin. She also paid special attention to a healing cut on my foot from an old pedicure where they used that razor thing (which I have NEVER had done before). She also told me that those razor things are ILLEGAL in the state of Illinois! And I know why... We were offered complimentary beverages which was nice! The mimosas were great and they kept them coming! When I get married this winter I am planning on bringing my bridal party here! Joanna is only working Saturdays right now, but she even offered to come in another day for my wedding party! That's great! The atmosphere here is nice and I felt very special and relaxed. I'm also a recovering nail-biter, so it was nice to go to a place where they didn't scold me for how janky my nails looked. They fixed them right up and I feel great! The prices I think are reasonable for the services offered here. For me, it's worth it because I don't do this very often. They also validate parking for you if you use the garage on State/Oak.

33.description: This is my go-to spa in Chicago! Their no-chips are AMAZING.  I have my hands in water basically all day, and this no-chip lasts through it all.  I am going on 3 weeks without a single corner lifting or peeling (which has been the case with every other no-chip mani.)  Holly is amazing! See her! Totally worth every penny.I am also just obsessed with Chloe for waxing and lashes.  Fastest wax of ever (which is so nice!) and she does an amazing job on my brows.  Lashes are always super awesome.  I get them in black, purple, blue, etc etc etc and people ask me about them all of the time! Super skilled. I can go as subtle or crazy as I want because she sits with you and consults/listens.  I have no damage to my lashes, and they look FAB.Highly recommend Stil Spa! They're great!

43.description: BEST nail salon in Chicago hands down. I've tried a lot of nail salons and none of them were worth the time and money. Yes, STIL is expensive but if I can go about two weeks without chipping my regular (not gel) manicure then that's a win to me! Loved Nina, best mani/pedi I've gotten in a really long time!

2.description: UPDATE: 17 days later and my gelish mani still looks pretty good, except for one nail lifted today and I had to take it off. Thanks again Stil for a great experience.

18.description: This was my first time at this salon and I have to say, this was the best experience I've ever had with having my nails done! I was hesitant at first due to the higher prices but I have to say -  they really care about their customers!I called one week in advance to schedule an appointment for a no-chip mani/pedi at 0900 am, as I would have been in the area after work. Although there was no availability, Ilva went ahead and accommodated my request anyway (how nice)! I was immediately greeted with a warm welcome by Ilva and offered a much needed mimosa :) Cindy was so detailed and definitely took her time working on my nails. It also helped that my empty mimosa glass was replaced with a glass of wine! I was thrilled with the way my nails looked and before I left, Ilva came by to let me know I could come back anytime if my no-chip didn't last prior to the guaranteed two weeks. Overall, this salon exceeded my expectations by far and I have already scheduled another appointment in two weeks, along with a European facial! I can tell this is going to be my new go-to place.

41.description: Spa pedi was awesome. Technicians were friendly, thorough and professional. Holly and Roxanne took care of my sister and I. Couldn't ask for a better pedi anywhere!! Super clean as well. Our go to spot for pedis from now on! Mimosa and wine were nice touches too. Why not five stars you might wonder? Well, we had our lashes tinted (or paid for it) and Chloe though nice, didn't take a lot of time. We could not tell the difference on either of us. We have had this done previously at another spa with great success, so can only wonder why this was so ineffective. Go for the pedi, skip the lash tint. Wish we would have...

52.description: I have been going to Maya for highlights for the past 3 years and she is the absolute best! I have recommended several friends and coworkers who have become devoted clients after their first visit. She is a color expert, especially with blondes! I look forward to every appointment with Maya!

50.description: How could you not love this place? I called for a last min appt and they were able to fit two of us in. Love sipping some champagne and having a great mani/pedi in this clean & cute salon!

4.description: My best friend and I went tonight for last-minute pedicures, and they were fantastic! I'm really glad we were able to get appointments just a few hours beforehand. Everyone we met was really nice, and our technicians, Holly and Tammy, were both great. My legs and feet feel amazing, and both of our polish jobs are really well done. The place was clean, hip, and had a great selection of brands and colors. We were even offered a glass of bubbly, but sadly, we both can't imbibe right now. So glad we decided STIL was the place for us! A little on the pricey side, but totally worth it. There's a huge difference between your usual salon and going somewhere upscale for a special treat. Next time I'm in Chicago, I'll definitely be back.

6.description: Last minute appointment for (regular) mani/pedi. Iris was my technician. She is somewhat new there and did a great job. She expertly removed my gel polish from a prior gel mani. It is 8 days later and my nails still look perfect. They have lots of polish choices and all the products and supplies look new. Tuesday special put it in my price range.

22.description: Fantastic Service! My wife and I walked in to STIL after reading Yelp reviews. There were no availabilities but Eva called every good salon and finally found one that had an opening. She went above and beyond for a new out of town client. I would give her 6 stars if available!

15.description: Matilda gave me a facial of a lifetime.  She is superb!!  Very informative without trying to sell me anything.  She knew I was a once a year client as I was in the city for a conference.  She treated me like one of her regular clients and did not skimp on anything.  I will be back next February and will ask specifically for her!

57.description: ugh, what is it about how expensive chicago mani/pedis are?  I finally decided to just bite the bullet and go for broke, since I was striking out at the 'cheap' places I was going to.  For $78, which is what this place charged, I was expecting at least a bit of a massage at the end or something, which is what I get with my $8 NYC manicures.  no dice.  OK, I know I'm being annoying.  This is a great place- I enjoyed the service and my wine, and the staff were very skilled.  My regular manicure lasted a full week with no chips, and my pedicure is still going strong a month later (ahem).  Also, Vera Wang bridal is across the street, and I quite enjoyed ogling women trying on their gorgeous kabillion dolla dresses while guzzling my free wine.

20.description: I decided to try this place out for a no-chip mani/pedi after reading the great reviews. I have to say, this place definitely lived up to my expectations. The pedicure was hands down the best I have ever received. I will for sure be going back!

36.description: I responded to Stela's comment on my review, asking her to refund my friend for her hair services.  She never responded.

14.description: STIL is my favorite salon/spa.  Wonderful service, Ivette is my nail tech. she is one of the best. Nails always look great, and feet so happy after the massage and manicure.  Everyone is so pleasant.  Glad Matilda joined the salon, she is the skin specialist, very good.STIL is a great place to relax and be pampered, great customer service.  They serve a mean cup of brew, love it.All in all, highly recommend STIL.Yola

28.description: For years it's been run by a careless and unprofessional staff UNTIL now. Tina is now back in the Gold Coast! She used to work for Vickie's Nails for like seven years, started her own business, and now owns Vickie's Nails. I am so ecstatic to see her again! When my friend told me who the new management was I couldn't believe it.Anyway, the place looks great; shiny with new decor. Of course I had Tina do my mani & pedi and honestly, she's the best. She knows how to treat a client like they're her favorite. I was so relaxed and had nice conversation with her, unlike most places I go where the technician can't speak English well enough to even ask me how I'm doing. Everyone needs to check out Vickie's Nails again because it is a completely different salon. I'm talking quality service for great prices. I'll be back for Tina :)

1.description: I have been going to this place for about 2 years, and it recently has come under new ownership. Since then, the salon has been cleaned up and undergone some cosmetic updates!  I value an efficient manicure, and this place provides that. Quality is good, and most technicians (the one I didn't care for doesn't seem to be working there any more) do a fine job.  I will continue to go to this place as long as I live close by.

9.description: After a grueling search for the perfect nail salon in the city, I've found it!!!! I stopped in for a quick fill and repair, and my nails look incredible! On top of the excellent performance of the tech, the owner was sitting and chit chatting with me which made me feel very at home. I'm now looking into planning bridal events at this location. I couldn't be more satisfied!!!

29.description: I went in for a pedicure...$25 it was a good pedicure but VERY uncomfortable...it was like a small plastic soak.....my chair was rolling he was rolling my legs were stressed and i couldn't relax because I was holding my legs up for 30 minutes,,,,I don't think I'll be back.

23.description: If I was ONLY reviewing my nails, I would give this place 4 stars. BUT, the customer service was horrible. The guy walked away, when he finished &  forgot all about me. "I" had to ask for help to put my boots back on & many other thing's. My nails were still wet, so I couldn't do much myself. The guy that did my nails, was looking right at me & obviously had no desire to help me. It was very rude. I felt like he finished my nails, got paid & tipped & then I was a piece of crap. Every employee was either on their phone, gettng their own massage in a pedicure chair, or watching a movie on their ipad. Hearing "Gold Coast" screams good customer service. Not here!Nails=4 starsCustomer Service=1 starPrices=3 stars

5.description: This place is amazing, and it's all because of it's amazing staff. Every single individual in the employed here is kind and welcoming, and it is heart warming to see the new owner Mike always in the front  of the  salon taking care of everyone. They recently renovated only to have gotten better and more chic. This was luckily the first nail salon I tried (regular mani/pedi) when I moved to Chicago, and has been the only salon I visit. I've  seen the entire staff go out of their way to ensure a memorable experience for all of their clients, and it's hard to find comparable dedication these days. I personally visit Jenny or Ray; however Julie, Tammy and everyone else there are extremely well-trained and professional. Again, I would highly recommend this salon.

31.description: Vickie's does an excellent job for manicures and pedicures. What the atmosphere lacks in decor is made up for with friendly staff and great service- very clean and professional, which you don't always find at a walk-in nail salon. The prices are reasonable and the manicures last longer than any other place I've been to. I give it two pink-Essie-manicured thumbs up!

25.description: I purchased a youswoop for a BYOB mani/pedi to Vickies Nails. I thought it sounded like a fun outing for myself and a friend for my birthday which was coming up. Unfortunately, I was wrong. I called and made an appointment as required by the youswoop and proceeded to show up for my appointment the following day. When I walked in, the salon was definitely busy. Every employee was with someone including Tina, who I have read about on Yelp reviews before I headed there. She did not get up to greet us, but just asked us to step over to her. I told her I was here for my appointment and she told me my appointment was an hour later, and proceeded to argue with me about what time the appointment was at. After futile discussion, I walked away to wait and she even continued to call after me about how she was right. Talk about embarrassing, not only for myself and yourself, but making a scene in front of about 20 other clients. Needless to say, unimpressed from the start with customer service.We decided to wait the hour anyway, since we had already traveled the distance there and I really wanted my nails to look nice for that evening and my birthday plans. Unfortunately nowhere was it posted that the establishment was BYOB and no other customers had a drink, so the drinks we had brought went unopened. At that point I felt way too awkward to even ask. Strike two, since it was advertised as such, and that was half the reason I bought the youswoop in the first place. We ended up waiting not only the hour, but another half and hour after, because two other girls came in who had an appointment earlier than our alleged "appointment" time. Waiting an hour and a half for a scheduled mani/pedi should NEVER EVER happen. Ridiculous. Throughout this entire waiting time, not one employee came up to speak with us or try to show any kind of appreciation that we were still waiting. Finally got to the mani/pedi. The gentleman who took care of me was very kind, and kept up friendly conversation with me. The nail job was pretty well done, I've had better but definitely a good job. He is the only reason that I am giving a two star rather than a one star rating. All in all, I was trying to have a good time for my birthday doing something which should take an hour/hour and a half, and had a horrible and uncomfortable experience which lasted FOUR hours. Never again.

12.description: I was impressed by the friendly staff and professional attitude. They took their time to do it right. Too many nail salons ignore you and talk to other staff. This place has a lot of regulars, but they pay to each client. Great job on the nails as well.

21.description: Best customer service at a nail salon. I arrived for my appt and they were full.Instead of asking me to wait Kevin found me a spot to tend to meAnd prep for my nails.After I got to a both I realized it was taking longer than I thought,So another girl jumped in to help. 2 people working on MeBecause I was in a hurry. Wonderful. I  couldn't have felt betterTaken care of. Clean, kind, attentive. And did my nails exactly as I wished,And I'm a tough customer. thank you Kevin and all thatHelped, ill be back every time!

16.description: The only reason I come here is because of Julie who used to do my nails at Old Town.  Otherwise, this place is kinda dumpy (eg. leaks in the ceiling, mold all around, not so pleasant to be getting treatments in). They're not as organized with appointments b/c even if you make one, you still may have to wait.

17.description: Holy gosh. I've gone to Ray twice now, and he is a WIZARD when it comes to nails! The first time, I went in bc my friend Rachel told me he's great with acrylic nails. When I went to him, he convinced me to just do gel nails, bc he didn't want me to take the chance of potentially ruining my nails. SO glad I went in!! My gel nails lasted THREE full weeks, thanks to him, and the only reason I went back today is bc my nails had grown out too long. Let me say that again - my nails had grown out, but my manicure was still perfect!! I'm telling you, he's a wizard! P. S. This man's attention to detail is phenomenal. My nails didn't even look like nails lol. I've never had such clean cuticles! Also, I've gotten gel nails done before, but never as well as he does them!

10.description: Under new ownership! The salon has undergone a renovation with all new nail stations, chairs,  and "spa pedicure" chairs. For those who demand cleanliness, this is the place to be! New, disposable tub liners are used for every pedicure (I have never seen this anywhere else.). Barbicide disinfectant is used for the soaking of all brushes at the sink.  This should be "commonplace" in ALL salons. Yet, it is not. Staff members are talented, kind, and professional. Pricing for services is competitive. Atmosphere is relaxing, and there is free wi-fi for customers. I highly recommend this salon and would not go anywhere else!!

11.description: The new owner, Michael, is awesome! He's so funny and really making some amazing changes!! Really connects with his customers! My favorite manicurist works here and I love it!!

26.description: I bought their you swoop offer for $20 mani-pedi and couldn't have been happier! And not just because of what a great deal it was. Everyone in there was so nice and accommodating and appreciative of my business.  I'm pretty picky about my french manicures and the girl who did them, did an amazing job. And the guy who did my pedicure was fantastic. Great leg/foot massage.  And finally, I went in for the eyebrow wax too while I was there. I am always a little nervous when someone new does my eyebrows, especially because I asked her to fix them a little but low and behold, another awesome job! I work close by so its very convenient for me to come by on lunch or after work.  I think I just made this my new favorite nail salon!

27.description: This place is amazing! I work in the Gold Coast and all of my coworkers had been, but this was my first time. It feels like a city salon, which I love.We scheduled an appointment for pedicures at 7:00 -- they close at 8. We called to let them know we were running a little bit behind and they said it was no problem. Then when we got there, I realized not only did I want a pedicure, but my fingernails could use some attention as well. I asked if it was ok and they were more than accommodating, even though it was 7:15-7:20 by now. The service was great (the two people doing my nails were both male.. can't remember their names!) as they let me relax and showed me how to use the massage chair. I was so relaxed! Afterwards, they led me to this OTHER chair, that is a therapeautic massage chair that massages not only your back but also your legs. By now it is about 8:00 - closing time.
